name: Egg in a barn
description: I am an aspiring Game developer learning to make games. This is my second game EVER check out my first game here James jones. I am completely open to feedback on good and bad aspects of the game. If you have any suggestions for features I should add to any of my games follow me here: EmeraldBear Profile page to stay updated on new games I make and updates I make to existing ones. Thank you for reading.
